comment.author: 66041448@N00
comment._content: This is a smudge painting made using Paint Shop Pro and a Wacom tablet with pressure sensitive stylus. It is based on a photo uploaded to Flicker by the San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives Appreciate the detail of the painting at: www.flickr.com/photos/paddrick/5688526439/sizes/o/in/phot... Paddy
